testsuite.name: JSONEndpoints.projects.ProjectEndpointTests

testcase.name: ERROR CASE: JSON payload is malformed - 400 Bad Request
CAPABILITY: Retrieve header for a project by id
BUG: Edit existing project using PUT with empty json body still returns 200 instead of error
CAPABILITY: Create project with valid JSON body
BUG: Create project with no body still succeeds (returns default empty fields)
CAPABILITY: Retrieve headers for all projects
BUG: Edit project with empty JSON body still returns 200 instead of error
ERROR CASE: PUT on /projects (without ID) not allowed — expect 405
CAPABILITY: Delete existing project and confirm it no longer exists
CAPABILITY: Edit existing project using POST /projects/:id
ERROR CASE: Delete a non existent project - 404 not found
ERROR CASE: Create project with id - error code 400
CAPABILITY: Retrieve existing project by ID (GET /projects/:id)
CAPABILITY: Get all projects when there is one project
ERROR CASE: Retrieve non-existent project by ID returns 404
CAPABILITY: Command-line style query ?title
ERROR CASE: Edit non existent project using PUT /projects/:id
ERROR CASE: XML payload is malformed - 400 Bad Request
ERROR CASE: Edit non existent project using POST /projects/:id
ERROR CASE: DELETE on /projects (without ID) not allowed — expect 405
BUG: Retrieve header for a project by non existent id returns 200
CAPABILITY: Edit existing project using PUT /projects/:id
